A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I absolutely loved this movie\, I really enjoyed pretty much everything that I saw in it. The scenery was incredible\, all of the planets\, the creatures\, the action\, it was incredible. The drama was great\, I enjoyed the interplay between the characters\, the nostalgia\, the ending was very good\, and it got me interested in seeing Episode IX\, I will definitely see this movie again!
